languages.text: "Воистину, ибо Истина всеобъемлюща и безбрежна. Лишь часть ее коснулась тебя — но ты откликнул{mf|ся|ась}. Ты можешь быть новым чемпионом".
"Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."
languages.original_text: "Воистину, ибо Истина всеобъемлюща и безбрежна. Лишь часть ее коснулась тебя — но ты откликнул{mf|ся|ась}. Ты можешь быть новым чемпионом".

traits.locale_text: "No, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new Champion."
"No, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new Champion."
"Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."
"Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."
"No, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new Champion."
"Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."

languages.text: “确实如此。无边的真理覆盖了一切，而你听到的那些声音，仅仅是因为它的一部分向你伸出了手，而你也答复了它。你可以成为新的勇士。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."

traits.locale_text: “并不是，因为无边的真理覆盖了一切。而你听到的那些声音，仅仅是因为它的一部分向你伸出了手，而你也答复了它。你可以成为新的勇士。”

languages.text: «Así es, pues la Verdad ilimitada lo cubre todo. Solo una mera parte se ha extendido hacia ti... y has respondido. Podrías convertirte en {mf|el|la} nuev{mf|o|a} campe{mf|ón|ona}».
languages.original_text: "Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."

traits.locale_text: «No, pues la Verdad ilimitada lo cubre todo. Solo una mera parte se ha extendido hacia ti... y has respondido. Podrías convertirte en {mf|el|la} nuev{mf|o|a} Campe{mf|ón|ona}».

languages.text: 「そう、無限の真理はすべてを包含するからだ。そのほんの一部が手を差し伸べ、そしてお前はそれに応えたのだ。お前は新しい覇者となり得るだろう」
languages.original_text: "Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."

traits.locale_text: 「いや、無限の真実はすべてを包含するからだ。ほんの一部がお前、そしてお前の答えに手を差し伸べただけだ。お前は新しいチャンピオンになれるかもしれない」
「そう、無限の真理はすべてを包含するからだ。そのほんの一部が手を差し伸べ、そしてお前はそれに応えたのだ。お前は新しい覇者となり得るだろう」

languages.text: « Certes, car la vérité infinie englobe tout. Vous n'avez été {mf|touché|touchée} que par une partie de cette vérité et vous lui avez répondu. Vous pourriez devenir {mf|le nouveau champion|la nouvelle championne}. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."

traits.locale_text: « Non, car la vérité infinie englobe tout. Vous n'avez été {mf|touché|touchée} que par une partie de cette vérité et vous lui avez répondu. Vous pourriez devenir {mf|le nouveau champion|la nouvelle championne}. »

languages.text: "In der Tat, denn die grenzenlose Wahrheit umfasst alles. Nur ein Teil davon hat sich an Euch gewandt – und Ihr habt geantwortet. Ihr könntet der neue Champion werden."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, denn die grenzenlose Wahrheit umfasst alles. Nur ein Teil davon hat sich an Euch gewandt – und Ihr habt geantwortet. Ihr könntet der neue Champion werden."

languages.text: "Evet. Zira hudutsuz Hakikat her şeyi sarıp sarmalar. Sadece tek bir parçası sana doğru uzandı, sen de yanıt verdin. Yeni müdafi sen olabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Zira hudutsuz Hakikat her şeyi sarıp sarmalar. Sadece tek bir parçası sana doğru uzandı, sen de yanıt verdin. Yeni müdafi sen olabilirsin."

languages.original_text: "Indeed, for the boundless Truth encompasses all. Merely one part of it reached out to you — and answer you did. You could become the new champion."
